Private Attributes

float shapeFactor

Detailed Description

This class handles coordinates to be used in splines. This class is derived from Coordinate.
Author:
Anthony Liekens

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SplineCoordinate::SplineCoordinate (    ) 
 

Constructor. Constructs a spline coordinate.

SplineCoordinate::SplineCoordinate (  int    x,
int    y,
float    shapeFactor
) 
 

Constructor. Constructs a spline coordinate.

Parameters:
x  X-axis value of the coordinate
y  Y-axis value of the coordinate
shapeFactor  The value of this factor must be between -1 (which means that the spline is interpolated at this point) and 1 (which means that the spline is approximated at this point). The spline is always smooth in the neighbourhood of a control point, except when the value of the factor is 0 for which there is a first-order discontinuity (i.e. angular point).

SplineCoordinate::SplineCoordinate (  Coordinate *    c,
float    shapefactor
) 
 

Constructor. Constructs a spline coordinate.

Parameters:
c  Coordinate of the spline coordinate
shapeFactor  The value of this factor must be between -1 (which means that the spline is interpolated at this point) and 1 (which means that the spline is approximated at this point). The spline is always smooth in the neighbourhood of a control point, except when the value of the factor is 0 for which there is a first-order discontinuity (i.e. angular point).

Destructor. Destructs a spline coordinate.

Set the shape factor

The spline is always smooth in the neighbourhood of a control point, except when the value of the factor is 0 for which there is a first-order discontinuity (i.e. angular point).
